items.sentence: No one noticed the picture was hung upside down.
Tom certainly seems to enjoy reading Mark Twain.
I thought Tom already had his driver\'s license.
Tom hardly ever relies on other people for help.
Tom has a brother who knows how to speak French.
Tom has a large hunting knife in his right hand.
Tom will be moving into his new house on Monday.
Tom will be moving into his new place on Monday.
This is all your fault. I hope you realize that.
Tom didn\'t seem surprised Mary didn\'t do that.
